scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --workspace=electron-app && npm install --workspace=dashboard && npm install --workspace=telegram-bot && npm install --workspace=shared
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=telegram-bot" "npm run dev --workspace=dashboard" "npm run dev --workspace=electron-app"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=dashboard && npm run build --workspace=electron-app
